title: How long until a persons account is deleted?
body: I have a friend who told me after 2-3 years no matter how much money you put into LOL your account will be deleted for inactivity?

replies.body: An account won't be deleted unless requested, and you can return to an inactive account at anytime!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yA8atFso,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-02T16:53:13.877+0000)
>
> An account won't be deleted unless requested, and you can return to an inactive account at anytime!

Awesome thanks, would this apply to accounts created 3 or more years ago as well?
no account is deleted  , even If you are inactive for 30 years , he is still able to login again.
